name: Nuit
temple_description:
Nuit was the Goddess of the Sky, the mother of the stars, the incarnation of the sky, and one of the nine pillar Goddesses of Heliopolis in ancient Egypt.
Nuit was also the God of Death, who provides air, water and food to the undead for their survival in the underworld. Therefore, Nuit was hailed as the Master of Everything.

active_skills.name: Ice world
active_skills.effect: 40% chance to Freeze for 1 round (target cannot move)

active_skills.name: Meteorite
active_skills.effect: 50% chance to remove 1 buff from enemy
